```{r}
#reading and wrangling
rawData <- read.csv("GIIHDI.csv")

#filtering
heat <- rawData %>% 
  arrange(desc(X2021)) %>% 
  slice(1:30) %>% 
  arrange(desc(HDI_rank))
  
```

```{r}
matrix <- heat
rownames(matrix) <- matrix[,1]
matrix <- matrix %>% dplyr::select(-Country, -HDI_value, -HDI_rank, -GII_value, -GII_rank, -X2021)
matrix <- as.matrix(matrix)

```
